(b) Annual report The foundation 22 So in original. Probably should be capitalized. shall submit to the President and to the Congress an annual report of its operations under this chapter.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Detailing of agency personnel to Foundation

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Detailing of agency personnel to Foundation On request of the Chairman of the Foundation, the head of a Federal agency may detail personnel of the agency to the Foundation to assist the Foundation in carrying out this chapter.1 Details under this subsection shall be without reimbursement by the Foundation to the agency from which personnel are detailed.
